mapper.select: select m.member_id,m.member_password, m.member_name, m.member_email, m.member_phone, m.member_point, d.license_no,d.license_type, to_char(d.license_renewal_term, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as license_renewal_term,to_char(d.license_issue_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as license_issue_date,d.gender,to_char(d.license_birth, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as license_birth,c.card_no,c.card_type,to_char(c.card_expiration_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as card_expiration_date,to_char(c.card_birth, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as card_birth from member m, driving_license d, card c where m.member_id=d.member_id and m.member_id=c.member_id and m.member_id=#{value}
